subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which emperor from the Maurya Dynasty was the founder of the city of Jaipur?
question_hi: मौर्य संतति के एकमात्र गुरु केवल जैसे राजपुर के स्थल की बनी एकमात्र प्रतिपादक था?
explanation_en:
Chandragupta Maurya was the founder of the city of Jaipur. He established the city in the 4th century BCE as the capital of his kingdom during the Maurya Dynasty.
(Note: Dinanath Bhatt is the authoritative figure who wrote about Jaipur's history, but he was not the founder of the city.)
